validation.required: {field} is required and cannot be empty
validation.invalidEmail: {field} must be a valid email address
validation.minLength: {field} must be at least {min} characters long

password.required: {field} is required and cannot be empty
password.minLength: {field} must be at least {min} characters long
password.uppercase: {field} must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: {field} must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: {field} must contain at least one number
password.specialChar: {field} must contain at least one special character

set-up-password.heading: Hello, {username}
set-up-password.title: Forgot password
set-up-password.followLink: Please follow the link to set up your password
